body: Hi im coming back to the sever (took a break for mc), and when I went on my sever list it says "can not resolve host name" and when I join it says "unknown host", am I connecting to the wrong sever is the ip still "skywars.co"? can some help me outthanks in advance :)
body_tagged: Hi im coming back to the sever (took a break for mc), and when I went on my sever list it says "can not resolve host name" and when I join it says "unknown host", am I connecting to the wrong sever is the ip still "skywars.co"? can some help me outthanks in advance :)
title: Server still up?

replies.body:
Hey!

Try to connect with the ip: Avic.us
replies.body_tagged:
Hey!

Try to connect with the ip: Avic.us

replies.body: Or try direct connecting to mczone02.avic.us
replies.body_tagged: Or try direct connecting to mczone02.avic.us

replies.body: The home page has proved unworthy.
replies.body_tagged: The home page has proved unworthy.

replies.body:
Hopefully your issue has resolved, it is nice for you to return! :)

Main:

avic.us

Alternates (I use):

nebula01.avic.us

nebula02.avic.us

nexus01.avic.us

nexus02.avic.us

Those are commonly the alternate IP's I tend to use, good luck, respond if you have any more issues or if the problem persists!

replies.body:
PSA:

The official Avicus IP is avic.us. _____.avic.us is acceptable and encouraged.

Please refrain from using skywars.co, wallsmc.com, mc-hg.org, mczone.co or any others. They were accepted in the past, but have gone away or will soon.
